metadata.title: CVE-2024-25082 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Splinefont in FontForge through 20230101 allows command injection viacrafted archives or compressed files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25082` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fontforge - 1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
fontforge-common - 1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
fontforge-extras - 1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
fontforge-nox - 1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
libfontforge4 - 1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
python3-fontforge - 1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fontforge package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:20201107~dfsg-4+deb11u1build0.22.04.1').
